rows.heading: Insect pests
rows.description: These are insects that damage your crops.
rows.examples: Some of the common insect pests include aphids, spidermites, thrips, whiteflies, mealy bugs, leafminers and caterpillars.

rows.heading: Beneficials
rows.description: These are animals or insects that feed on the insect pests.
rows.examples: Some common beneficial insects include ladybugs, lacewings, dragon flies, spiders and praying mantis.
